Literature.Title: N-Acylated and D enantiomer derivatives of a nonamer core peptide of lactoferricin B showing improved antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Wakabayashi H, Matsumoto H, Hashimoto K, Teraguchi S, Takase M, Hayasawa H

Literature.Title: The antimicrobial activity of hexapeptides derived from synthetic combinatorial libraries.
Literature.Author: Blondelle SE, Takahashi E, Dinh KT, Houghten RA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli IID 861(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3445(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2151(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli IID 861(MIC=12µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3445(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2151(MIC=12µg/ml),Candida albicans TIMM 0144(MIC=50µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes TIMM 1189(MIC=6µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(IC50=11-12µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10566(IC50=22-45µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=12-18µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=31.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC50=87-130µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(IC50=100-101µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=250µg/ml)
